trends.topic: Anthropic unveils multi-session Claude SDK, claiming breakthrough in persistent AI agents
trends.reason: Anthropic is launching a new multi-session Claude SDK that it says solves the long-standing challenge of building reliable, stateful AI agents, marking a concrete product milestone that could accelerate deployment of autonomous and semi-autonomous agent workflows in enterprises and developer tools.
trends.search_keywords: Anthropic Claude SDK, multi-session Claude agents, Anthropic AI agent problem, stateful LLM agents, Claude developer SDK, autonomous agent workflows
